Additionally, a low gas tank can also cause the fuel to evaporate more quickly, which means that you'll have to refuel more frequently. 

Instead of keeping your gas tank low, you can save money on gas by driving more efficiently. This includes driving at a steady speed, avoiding sudden accelerations and stops, and maintaining a safe distance from other vehicles to avoid unnecessary braking. You can also try carpooling, using public transportation, or even walking or biking for shorter distances.
